details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.20 XObjects - MCID
details.description: The content of Form XObjects shall be incorporated into structure elements according to ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.7.2.

rule.description: The content of Form XObjects shall be incorporated into structure elements according to ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.7.2.

error.message: Form XObject contains MCIDs and is referenced more than once
